channel.title: Pk area
channel.description: I'm trying to make a large area for pking in a 718 source, I've made it multi lol but I need to get to to where I can attack someone there.

item.title: Pk area
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

In World.java you can make the pvp zone by doing something like this:

private static boolean edgeBank(Player player) { return (player.getX() > 3090 && player.getY() < 3500 && player.getX() < 3099 && player.getY() > 3487); }

private void pvpZone(Player player) { if (edgeBank(player)) { player.setCanPvp(true); } else { player.setCanPvp(false); } }

then somewhere [font=arial]near[/font] entity.checkMultiArea() add pvpZone(player);

Don’t forget to import Player.java - import com.rs.game.player.Player;

Read full topic
